name: Deepwell
description:
Isolated deep into national park wilderness is the town of Deepwell.

A story driven adventure game, about a small town surrounding a giant mystery hole.


Features:
  • The handful of weirdos who live in Deepwell make good conversation partners.
  • A fully handcrafted town full of places to explore and things to find.
  • A whoooooole bunch of secrets, big and small.
  • Happiness.
  • Sadness.
  • A lingering feeling of emptiness.
